summary: Custom settings for FXAA Post Process Injector
descriptionHtml:
You are tired of many pseudo-realistic FXAA Post Project Injector settings? You cannot stand over-sharpening look like in Borderlands or over-saturating wich changes cold Skyrim into Happyland? NO MOAR! My settings are really balanced and these keeps cold Skyrim atmosphere.. or even better - it makes Skyrim colder than before! but I can guarantee that it don\'t ruin your gaming experience.

Why I created these settings? Because I was upset of unbalanced settings of other users, I couldn\'t choose perfect settings for me, so I decided to do this myself, and here you go!

Installation:
1. Firstly you have to have installed original FXAA Post Project Injector by Retspadez, here\'s link: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131
2. Now you have to download my settings and simply put the \'injFX_Settings.h\' file in the archieve to the main Skyrim folder, D:/Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim by default.
3. Run Skyrim and play!


Uninstall:
Replace with another \'injFX_Settings.h\' or click \'Uninstall.exe\' in the main Skyrim folder from FXAA PPI.

I hope you enjoy.

Credits:

Thanks to Retspadez for creating FXAA Post Project Injector
Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating such beautiful game like Skyrim.

PS. Sorry if my english is bad, I\'m from Poland. :)
author: Dristor
